name: Training Quad Bike: Military B
description:
Training Quad Bike: Military Base is all about atv bike racing skills and control as you guide your rider across the ramps, tracks with jumps and barrels. Time to become a quad atv rider and start top speed atv quad bike racing . So let’s start atv quad moto racing with racing quad bike moto stunt atv on fastest mega racing tracks in top racing simulator game for tricky rider race lovers.
Features:
- Simple game play as a fast racing game with smooth control
- Impossible tracks off-road environment
- Many Challenging levels for bike riders – Quad bike
- Amazing 3D graphics
- Awesome off-road tracks and hilly environment
- Realistic game controls for stunt driving & racing
